---
title: 工具提示
description: 工具提示是用户与元素交互时出现的简短、信息丰富的消息。工具提示通常以两种方式之一启动：通过鼠标悬停手势或通过键盘悬停手势。
---

import { Tooltip, TooltipTrigger, TooltipArrow, TooltipContent, Button, useDisclosure } from '@resolid/react-ui';
import { mergeFrontmatter } from "@resolid/remix-utils";
import { ComponentProps, ComponentExample, ComponentUsage } from "../__components";

export const meta = mergeFrontmatter(frontmatter);

# {frontmatter.title}

{frontmatter.description}

## 导入

```js
import { Tooltip, TooltipTrigger, TooltipArrow, TooltipContent } from '@resolid/react-ui';
```

- `Tooltip`: 为其子级提供上下文的包装器。
- `TooltipTrigger`: 用于包装引用或触发元素。
- `TooltipContent`: 工具提示内容。
- `TooltipArrow`: 指向引用或触发元素的视觉箭头。

## 用法

<ComponentUsage componentFile={"./tooltip/Tooltip.tsx"} ignoreProps={["opened", "duration"]}
  preview={(props) => (<Tooltip {...props}>
  <TooltipTrigger asChild>
    <Button>
      带有工具提示的按钮
    </Button>
  </TooltipTrigger>
  <TooltipContent>
    <TooltipArrow />
    工具提示内容
  </TooltipContent>
</Tooltip>)} />

## 可控

<section className={'example group'}>
  <ComponentExample className={"flex flex-row gap-3"}>
    {() => {
      const { opened, toggle } = useDisclosure();

      return (
        <Tooltip opened={opened}>
          <TooltipTrigger asChild>
            <Button variant={'outline'} onClick={toggle}>
              点击切换工具提示显示
            </Button>
          </TooltipTrigger>
          <TooltipContent>可控的工具提示</TooltipContent>
        </Tooltip>
      );
    }}
  </ComponentExample>

  ```jsx
  const { opened, toggle } = useDisclosure();

  return (
  <Tooltip opened={opened}>
    <TooltipTrigger asChild>
      <Button variant={'outline'} onClick={toggle}>
        点击切换
      </Button>
    </TooltipTrigger>
    <TooltipContent>可控的工具提示</TooltipContent>
  </Tooltip>
  );
  ```
</section>

## 动画持续时间

<section className={'example group'}>
  <ComponentExample className={"flex flex-row gap-3"}>
    <Tooltip duration={3000}>
      <TooltipTrigger asChild>
        <Button>动画持续时间</Button>
      </TooltipTrigger>
      <TooltipContent>
        <TooltipArrow />
        持续时间很长
      </TooltipContent>
    </Tooltip>
  </ComponentExample>

  ```jsx
  <Tooltip duration={3000}>
    <TooltipTrigger asChild>
      <Button>动画持续时间</Button>
    </TooltipTrigger>
    <TooltipContent>
      <TooltipArrow />
      持续时间很长
    </TooltipContent>
  </Tooltip>
  ```
</section>

## 颜色
<section className={'example group'}>
  <ComponentExample className={"flex flex-row gap-3"}>
      {["primary", "neutral", "success", "warning", "danger"].map((color) => (
        <Tooltip placement={"bottom"} key={color} color={color}>
          <TooltipTrigger asChild>
            <Button className={"capitalize"} color={color} variant={"soft"}>{color}</Button>
          </TooltipTrigger>
          <TooltipContent className={"capitalize"}>
            <TooltipArrow />
            {color} 消息提示
          </TooltipContent>
        </Tooltip>
      ))}
  </ComponentExample>
  
  ```jsx
  {["primary", "neutral", "success", "warning", "danger"].map((color) => (
    <Tooltip placement={"bottom"} key={color} color={color}>
      <TooltipTrigger asChild>
        <Button className={"capitalize"} color={color} variant={"soft"}>{color}</Button>
      </TooltipTrigger>
      <TooltipContent className={"capitalize"}>
        <TooltipArrow />
        {color} 消息提示
      </TooltipContent>
    </Tooltip>
  ))}
  ```
</section>

## 放置位置

<section className={'example group'}>
  <ComponentExample>
    <div className={'mx-auto grid w-fit gap-2'}
      style={{
        gridTemplateAreas:
          '".           top-start     top         top-end       .            "' +
          '"left-start  .             .           .             right-start  "' +
          '"left        .             center      .             right        "' +
          '"left-end    .             .           .             right-end    "' +
          '".           bottom-start  bottom      bottom-end    .            "',
      }}
    >
      {[
        ['top-start', '上左'],
        ['top', '上'],
        ['top-end', '上右'],
        ['left-start', '左上'],
        ['left', '左'],
        ['left-end', '左下'],
        ['auto', '自动'],
        ['right-start', '右上'],
        ['right', '右'],
        ['right-end', '右下'],
        ['bottom-start', '下左'],
        ['bottom', '下'],
        ['bottom-end', '下右'],
      ].map(([placement, name]) => (
        <Tooltip key={placement} placement={placement}>
          <TooltipTrigger asChild>
            <span
              style={{ gridArea: placement == 'auto' ? 'center' : placement }}
              className={
                'flex h-12 w-12 text-center leading-tight text-sm cursor-default items-center justify-center rounded bg-bg-muted'
              }
            >
            {name}
          </span>
          </TooltipTrigger>
          <TooltipContent>
            <TooltipArrow />
            {name}位置消息提示
          </TooltipContent>
        </Tooltip>
      ))}
    </div>
  </ComponentExample>

  ```jsx
  <div className={'mx-auto grid w-fit gap-2'}
       style={{
         gridTemplateAreas:
           '".           top-start     top         top-end       .            "' +
           '"left-start  .             .           .             right-start  "' +
           '"left        .             center      .             right        "' +
           '"left-end    .             .           .             right-end    "' +
           '".           bottom-start  bottom      bottom-end    .            "',
       }}
  >
    {[
      ['top-start', '上左'],
      ['top', '上'],
      ['top-end', '上右'],
      ['left-start', '左上'],
      ['left', '左'],
      ['left-end', '左下'],
      ['auto', '自动'],
      ['right-start', '右上'],
      ['right', '右'],
      ['right-end', '右下'],
      ['bottom-start', '下左'],
      ['bottom', '下'],
      ['bottom-end', '下右'],
    ].map(([placement, name]) => (
      <Tooltip key={placement} placement={placement}>
        <TooltipTrigger asChild>
            <span
              style={{ gridArea: placement == 'auto' ? 'center' : placement }}
              className={
                'flex h-12 w-12 text-center leading-tight text-sm cursor-default items-center justify-center rounded bg-bg-muted'
              }
            >
            {name}
          </span>
        </TooltipTrigger>
        <TooltipContent>
          <TooltipArrow />
          {name}位置消息提示
        </TooltipContent>
      </Tooltip>
    ))}
  </div>
  ```
</section>
